title: The Getty MART JSON Schema Documentation for Activity Entity Documents
description: This document describes the structure and content of Activity entity documents stored within the Getty MART Linked Data system. The Activity entity documents follow the Activity entity schema defined at https://linked.art/model/place/

citation.title: The Getty MART JSON Schema Documentation for Activity Entity Documents

resourceInfo.abstract: The J. Paul Getty Trust is sharing Linked Data representations of its Collections data.

id.title: The Activity Document's ID
id.description: This field contains the Activity's ID, expressed as an absolute URL.

type.title: The Activity Document's Type
type.description: This field contains the Activity document's type, expressed as a string. It will always be 'Activity' for Activity entity documents.

_label.title: The Activity Document's Developer-Friendly Label
_label.description: This field contains the document's developer-friendly label. This label is intended for reference purposes only as a development aid to provide a short human-readable summary of the contents of the current document or document fragment, and is not intended to be acted upon or displayed in any downstream system.
examples: Getty Center, Museum West Pavilion, Gallery W203

classified_as.title: The Activity's classified_as Property
classified_as.description: This field contains classifications associated with the Activity. These may include classifications related to the Activity's type, and other classifiable attributes, etc.

identified_by.title: The Activity's identified_by Property
identified_by.description: This field contains identifiers associated with the Activity. These may include names used to refer to the Activity, alternative document IDs, alternative names, etc.

part_of.title: The Activity's part_of Property
part_of.description: This field contains information about the Activity's hierarchy, whereby the system may provide additional partitioning information about the Activity. This may include information about the Activity's parent place, such as a city's parent region, a region's parent country, etc.

current_location.title: The Activity's current_location Property
current_location.description: This field contains information about the Activity's current location. For instance, if the Activity describes a building, its current_location property can be used to describe the building's location.
